text: 1.19 Kis 12.5, Ais 53.7, Jon 1.29, 1.36, Apo 20.28, 1 Ko 5.7, Hib 9.12-14, 1 Pi 1.2, Lep 5.9 Ne Klays nɨkɨm ne ak ñɨl, nɨbop gɨñɨl anɨgɨl dak. Nɨkɨm anɨb ak, tap awl yɨbɨl. Klays ne chag sipsip ñɨluk olap tek yek. Chag sipsip ñɨluk God nop sɨbog ñɨbal okok, tap tɨmel olap ma mɨdɨl, soy tap okok ma mɨdeb. Klays abe, tap tɨmel olap ma mɨdɨl, gach sek ma mɨdeb.
